channel.description: Recent content in pre_commit on 老高的技术博客

item.title: SVN预提交(Pre-Commit)钩子的利用
item.description: 转自：http://java.dzone.com/articles/useful-subversion-pre-commit Checks whether the commit message is not empty Checks whether the commit message consists of at least 5 characters Checks if the committed files are UTF-8 compliant Checks whether the svn:eol-style property is set to LF on newly added files Checks if the committed files have no TAB characters The UTF-8 and TAB checks are performed on the following file suffixes *.java *.js *.xhtml *.css *.xml *.
